ðŸ“– Summary: Shattered Pixel Dungeon is an open-source roguelike game based on the source code of Pixel Dungeon. It features randomized levels, enemies, and items, and is available on Android, iOS, and Desktop platforms. The repository provides the game's source code for others to learn from and potentially adapt for their own projects.
